== DocViewer Spec ==

=== User Story #1 Downloads ===
As a user I want to open common office attachments I download from the internet

==== Functional Definition ====
* Method to receive files via Content Hub from other applications
* Method to determine file format and utilise the appropriate viewer

==== Design ====
* Document viewer (phone)
<nowiki>[[File:AppSpecTemplate/Needs design phone.png||width=200]]</nowiki>
* Document viewer (tablet)
<nowiki>[[File:AppSpecTemplate/Needs design tablet.png||width=200]]</nowiki>
* Document viewer (desktop)
<nowiki>[[File:AppSpecTemplate/Needs design desktop.png||width=200]]</nowiki>

=== User Story #2 Read ===
As a user I want to open a document previously saved on my device so I can read it again

==== Functional Definition ====
* Method to obtain files from File Manager via Content Hub.

==== Design ====
* Open file via content hub button
